name: Cut the Rope
description: A mysterious package has arrived, and the little monster inside has only one request… CANDY! Use your mouse to cut the ropes and release delicious bundles of candy into Om Nom's mouth. As you keep your new companion's sweet tooth satisfied, be sure to collect shiny gold stars to unlock new levels.
minimum_requirements: OS:XPProcessor:1 GHzMemory:512 MB RAMGraphics:supports Shader Model 1.1Hard Drive:150 MB HD spaceSound:optional

reviews.review_text: Typical port of an amazing game to Steam, a really good game when youre bored, and dont get too cocky, cause this game 's puzzles will ♥♥♥♥ with your brain, very challenging and fun.  7.5/10
If you Have $5 to spend....Get this, its a GREAT bordom killer!
A few years ago I worked at Burger King and they got toys of the green dinosaur guy. I stole a whole box from storage and it's still sitting in my closet. They never found out.  10/10
